items.sentence: Tom and Mary told me they\'re going to Boston tomorrow.
Tom and Mary wanted to spend Valentine\'s Day together.
I suspect that Tom and Mary went to Australia together.
You might want to think about this a little bit longer.
You never can tell what might happen if Tom meets Mary.
I wonder who would be calling us at this time of night.
Tom can\'t believe Mary\'s pretending nothing\'s wrong.
Do you want to be stuck here for the rest of your life?
I would\'ve liked to wish you happy birthday in person.
Is there anybody here who can explain what\'s going on?
